name: Olaf Merkert
what_is_my_connection_to_javascript: In my day job, I work as a Software Consultant on a technology migration project, focusing on a growing React+Redux Frontend written in TypeScript. I have been programming and playing with JavaScript since my school days when IE6 was the state of the art.
what_can_i_contribute: I would like to learn and discuss about continuous improvement in the React ecosystem and beyond. I would also be interesting in comparing experiences in teaching new developers about the intricacies and marvels of JavaScript and functional programming.
